title: Clion的项目设置
content:
Clion的项目设置

编译器选择cmake或者Visual Studio自带的nmake即可.
如果使用Clion创建新项目, 我们需要对项目做如下修改:
在根目录下的文件:
CMakeLists.txt
        # 设置支持编译的cmake最低版本为3.16
        cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16)
        
        #设置策略CMP0091
        if (POLICY CMP0091)
            cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
        endif (POLICY CMP0091)
        
        # 定义程序名称为HelloClion
        project(HelloClion)
        
        # 设置使用C++17标准
        set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 17)
        
        #添加程序预编译宏定义
        add_definitions(-DwxMSVC_VERSION_AUTO=1)
        add_definitions(-DwxMSVC_VERSION_COMPAT=1)
        add_definitions(-DUNICODE=1)
        
        #添加搜索目录(WXWIN为系统环境变量表示wxWidgets根目录)
        include_directories(
                $ENV{WXWIN}/include
                $ENV{WXWIN}/lib/vc14x_lib/mswud
        )
        
        # 添加链接库目录
        link_directories(
                $ENV{WXWIN}/lib/vc14x_lib
        )
        
        # 添加可执行文件${PROJECT_NAME}
        add_executable(${PROJECT_NAME} WIN32
                HelloClion.cpp HelloClion.h)
        
        # 设置调试模式为静态多线程成:MT/MTd
        set_property(
                TARGET ${PROJECT_NAME} PROPERTY
                MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>"
        )
        
        # 设置应用程序为窗口程序
        if(CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME STREQUAL "Windows")
            set_property(TARGET ${PROJECT_NAME} PROPERTY WIN32_EXECUTABLE true)
        endif()
        
        # 链接wxWidgets库文件到 可执行文件${PROJECT_NAME}
        target_link_libraries(
                ${PROJECT_NAME}
                shlwapi.lib
                version.lib
                comctl32.lib
                rpcrt4.lib
                ws2_32.lib
                wininet.lib
                winmm.lib
                wxmsw32ud_gl.lib
                wxmsw32ud_stc.lib
                wxmsw32ud_richtext.lib
                wxmsw32ud_propgrid.lib
                wxmsw32ud_ribbon.lib
                wxmsw32ud_aui.lib
                wxmsw32ud_xrc.lib
                wxbase32ud_xml.lib
                wxmsw32ud_qa.lib
                wxmsw32ud_webview.lib
                wxmsw32ud_html.lib
                wxmsw32ud_media.lib
                wxmsw32ud_adv.lib
                wxmsw32ud_core.lib
                wxbase32ud_net.lib
                wxbase32ud.lib
                wxscintillad.lib
                wxexpatd.lib
                wxtiffd.lib
                wxjpegd.lib
                wxpngd.lib
                wxzlibd.lib
                wxregexud.lib
                wxmsw32u_gl.lib
        )
将以上cmakelists.txt文件集成到工程自动生成的cmakelists.txt文件中即可.
